subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: The Belmont Stakes will be worth $1.5 million next year, the first purse increase for the final leg of horse racing’s Triple Crown since 1998.
snippet: The Belmont Stakes will be worth $1.5 million next year, the first purse increase for the final leg of horse racing’s Triple Crown since 1998.
